name: Bob
message_content: Hi Alice! I'm doing well, just got back from a run.

name: Charlie
message_content: Good morning! I just finished my coffee.

name: Alice
message_content: Nice! I just saw this amazing sunrise. Check it out!

name: Bob
message_content: Wow, that's beautiful! Where did you take it?

name: Alice
message_content: From my balcony. The view is amazing in the mornings.

name: Charlie
message_content: I wish I could see it in person. Here's a video from my walk yesterday.

name: Bob
message_content: Looks like a peaceful place. Thanks for sharing!

name: Alice
message_content: I'll send a voice message later with more details.
